subtitle: Translating the latest expertise in sustainable development into action in the Sahel Region
featureContent:
The Sustainable Development Solutions Network (SDSN) a global community of universities, research centers, and knowledge institutions. Our National network aims to teach sustainable development, support solution initiatives, and localize the SDGs in the Sahel Region.

We engage with scientists, engineers, business and civil society leaders, and development practitioners for evidence-based problem-solving.

benefitsTitle: Join our global network and work on practical solutions for sustainable development
